content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: To craft end_stone_brick_slab, I first need to craft end_stone_bricks. I can do this by placing 4 end_stone in a 2x2 grid. Since I have 4 end_stone in slot 14, I will move 1 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Since I have moved 1 end_stone to slot 1, I now need to move 1 end_stone to slot 2. This will place 2 end_stone in the top row of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1
